definition: variant of 合併|合并[he2 bing4]
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge

sentences.english: The negotiating groups have developed consolidated legal text in virtually all negotiating groups.
sentences.chinese: 谈判小组在几乎所有的谈判中均已完成法律文本合并。

sentences.english: Those of you who are weak will be merged.
sentences.chinese: 你们当中财务较弱的银行将会被合并。

sentences.english: The results indicated that gonorrhoea was related with infection of toxoplasma gondii.
sentences.chinese: 提示淋病患者存在合并弓形虫感染的可能性。

sentences.english: Objective To treat acute myocardial infarction with cardiogenic shock by emegency PCI.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨急性心肌梗死合并心源性休克的抢救方法。

sentences.english: An intense ring of stars forms at the outer edges of the new, combined galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 激烈的环星形式在外层空间边缘，新合并的星系。

sentences.english: You can do this by joining the tables and merging the information between them.
sentences.chinese: 您可以联系表格，并合并表格中的信息来完成这一点。

sentences.english: Our club has affiliated with a national society.
sentences.chinese: 我们俱乐部已与一个全国性协会合并。

sentences.english: The message set is then reordered into the combined fragment.
sentences.chinese: 消息集合也会重新排序到合并的片段中。

sentences.english: The pain had become constant in the last two months and was associated with diarrhea and tenesmus.
sentences.chinese: 近二个月有持续疼痛的情形，且合并腹泻及裹急后重。

sentences.english: Incorporate quotations of three lines or less into the text, within single quotation marks.
sentences.chinese: 文本中三行或更少的合并的引用语，用单引号。

sentences.english: HP completes its merger transaction with Compaq Computer Corp.
sentences.chinese: 惠普公司完成了其与康柏电脑公司的合并。

sentences.english: Installs redistributable merge modules and a set of graphics.
sentences.chinese: 安装可再发行的合并模块和一组图形。

sentences.english: It is to be merged with the National Enterprise Board.
sentences.chinese: 它将与国家企业局合并。

sentences.english: The government hoped to consolidate ten states to form three new ones.
sentences.chinese: 政府希望把十个州合并成三个新的州。

sentences.english: Three patients were died among which 2 were died of mycotic septicemia and 1 cardiac failure.
sentences.chinese: 合并霉菌性败血症2例，合并心功能衰竭1例。

definition: expansion/dilation/to expand (e.g. one's power or influence)/to broaden
to establish/to set up/to be tenable/to hold water
tycoon/magnate/big player (including company, country, school etc)/big shot
to peel/to strip/to peel off/to come off (of tissue, skin, covering etc)
merger and acquisition (M and A)/acquisition/to take over
